nodes.text: Mannock T'sank was a large Sith apprentice during the Cold War era that followed the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. In 3649 BBY, T'sank beat the first-year student Jura Ostrogoth into unconsciousness before stripping him naked and tying him to a bunk. Before T'sank could further abuse the new Sith Acolyte, he was knocked out by the Zabrak Scopique, who attacked him from behind.
